authors.name: David Cuillier
authors.affiliation: University of Arizona School of Journalism

title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + FOI Power Tools
description: A guide to using the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) to acquire and utilize government data, including tools and resources for identifying data, getting records, and overcoming denials.
